title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1954/1999 of 13 September 1999 prohibiting fishing for whiting by vessels flying the flag of France
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1954/1999
of 13 September 1999
prohibiting fishing for whiting by vessels flying the flag of France
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of whiting in the waters of ICES division VIIa by vessels flying the flag of France or registered in France are hereby deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to France for 1999.
Fishing for whiting in the waters of ICES division VIIa by vessels flying the flag of France or registered in France is hereby prohibited, as are the retention on board, transhipment and landing of this stock caught by the above vessels after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 20 August 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
